name: Muffin Tour Legacy: Demo
description:
This is a conceptual demo for a side-scrolling platformer with animation centric cinematics.  Play as Molly the baker that saves the universe from the Evil Bearclaw King and his pastry army.

In this demo Molly takes on Cake Boss, a minion of the evil Bear Claw king. Use keyboard or your controller to control Molly the baker and help her defeat Cake Boss while it shoots out toxic frosting and spawns hordes of dangeous muffins. 

Stomp on muffins and collect baker dust. When you have collected enough and your bar is full you can unleash magical attacks on the boss! Be sure to use your surroundings to avoid attacks, and launch your own magical barrage from on top of that rock.
